trans-unit.source: The exception thrown when an error occurs during serialization or deserialization.
trans-unit.target: 當序列化或還原序列化期間發生錯誤時，所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException> uses the `HRESULT` COR_E_SERIALIZATION with the value 0x8013150C.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException> 使用`HRESULT`COR_E_SERIALIZATION 0x8013150C 的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException> uses the default <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> implementation, which supports reference equality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException> 使用預設的<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>支援參考相等的實作。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException>, see the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException.%23ctor%2A> constructors.
trans-unit.target: 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException>，請參閱<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException" /> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設屬性，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException> inherits from the <xref:System.SystemException> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException> 繼承自<xref:System.SystemException>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException> initialized with the current constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException>初始化與目前的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Condition
trans-unit.target: 條件

trans-unit.source: Localized error message for <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException>.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化的錯誤訊息，取得<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the reason why the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 指示發生例外狀況的原因。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException" /> class with a specified message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException> inherits from the <xref:System.SystemException> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException> 繼承自<xref:System.SystemException>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException> initialized with the current constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException>初始化與目前的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Condition
trans-unit.target: 條件

trans-unit.source: The `message` string.
trans-unit.target: `message`字串。

trans-unit.source: The serialization information object holding the serialized object data in the name-value form.
trans-unit.target: 序列化資訊物件，包含具有名稱/值形式的已序列化物件資料。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination of the exception.
trans-unit.target: 關於例外狀況的來源或目的端的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException" /> class from serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 從序列化資料中，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The current constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 目前的建構函式是以重新構成經由資料流傳輸的例外狀況物件的還原序列化期間呼叫。

trans-unit.source: (For more information on serialization see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).)
trans-unit.target: (如需序列化的詳細資訊請參閱[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。)

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="info" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="info" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 參數不是 <see langword="null" />，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外的 <see langword="catch" /> 區塊中引發。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性會傳回相同的值傳遞到建構函式或`null`如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: The inner exception reference.
trans-unit.target: 內部例外狀況參考。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤訊息字串。
